inclusion.criterion: Patients (> 18 years) with rheumatoid arthritis according to the ACR(1987 or 2010)/EULAR (2010) classification criteria
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: treated with alendronate for five years or more
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: current T-score on DXA better than or equal to -2,5 (femoral) and -3,0 (vertebral)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: receiving treatment on an outpatient basis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: negative pregnancy test (serum HCG) prior to trial start and the use of contraception throughout the study period and for 1 month after conclusion of the study period for women of childbearing potential.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Plasma T1/2 of ALN is less than 2 hours
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: ability and willingness to give written informed consent and to meet the requirements of the trial protocol.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of hip fracture due to osteoporosis
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of vertebral fracture of more than one vertebrae or other fragility fractures within the last three years (fingers and toes not included)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: history of or ongoing systemic GC treatment within the last 6 months (intraarticular injections are approved)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: known allergy toward any components of the study medicine
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient has a history of Paget's Disease of Bone and is being treated with Bisphosphonate. However, they have a history of hip fracture due to osteoporosis, which makes them likely ineligible for the trial.
